snippet: Scholars and others are balking at a plan by the New York Public Library to restructure its resources.
abstract: Ginia Bellafante Big City column suggests that fears surrounding the New York Public Library’s plan to expand its central branch at Fifth Avenue and 42nd Street may be unfounded; says protests against the expansion are led by those who worry that the addition of a circulating library and more common space would compromise the branch's integrity as a research institution, but there is little evidence that this is true.
lead_paragraph: Scholars and others are balking at a plan by the New York Public Library to restructure its resources.

headline.print_headline: Shh! Scholars Fight Over Library Plan
headline.seo: Scholars Fighting Over New York Public Library’s Expansion Plan
headline.main: Shh! Scholars Fight Over Library Plan
